radioButton - Variable in class com.example.noteation.fragments.TasksFragment

ReminderBroadcastReceiver - Class in com.example.noteation.broadcastRecievers
This class is in charge of receiving the broadcast of when the reminder is equal to the current time, when it receives the broadcast, it sends a message to the user alerting him that the time of the task's reminder has come destination of his task
ReminderBroadcastReceiver() - Constructor for class com.example.noteation.broadcastRecievers.ReminderBroadcastReceiver
